name: strand-pulldown-button
description: A fully-styled pulldown button, with multiple options.

attributes.name: fitparent
attributes.description: determines if the button fits to its parent container's width. when true the button will effectively be width:100%

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: the current status of the textarea. When true user input will not be accepted and the field is greyed out.

attributes.name: error
attributes.description: Triggers the display of invalid visual state.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: The type of styling to be applied to the button

detail.name: index
detail.description: The index of the active item

detail.name: item
detail.description: A reference to the item which triggered the event

detail.name: value
detail.description: Value of the selected item, usually it's label
